characteristic.name: Relative Runtime in a Generic Level Range
characteristic.description:
The Relative Runtime in a Generic Level Range characteristic is used to represent a runtime in a generic level range.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to Generic Level characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.generic_level}
Refer to Generic Level characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.generic_level}
